item.title: About
item.description: Programmer, data plumber, and conservative Christian. Nice to meet you. This site is under construction. Meanwhile, you may reach me via email.

item.title: First post
item.description: Be the root directory for this Hugo site (the directory containing config.toml). Run hugo server --port 1111 See the site served on “http://localhost:1111/”.
